net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base

Class AbstractConfiguredSearchIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.search.indexer.base.AbstractConfiguredSearchIndexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfiguredSearchIndexer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfiguredSearchIndexerImpl

    public abstract class AbstractConfiguredSearchIndexer
extends AbstractLoggableComponent
implements ConfiguredSearchIndexer
    This is the implementation of the ConfiguredSearchIndexer.
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

      • index

        public void index(String configurationLocation)
        This method reads the SearchIndexerConfiguration from the given configurationLocation and performs the indexing.
        Specified by:
        index in interface ConfiguredSearchIndexer
        Parameters:
        configurationLocation - is the location where the configuration data shall be read from. This is typically a path into the filesystem.
